title: Count Words in a String
description: Write a function that takes a string and returns the total number of words using str_word_count().
solution:
<?php
function countWords($str) {
  return str_word_count($str);
}
echo countWords('Hello from TechVerse');
?>

title: Implement Simple Calculator Function
description: Create a function calc(a, b, op) that performs +, -, *, or /.
solution:
<?php
function calc($a,$b,$op){
  switch($op){
    case '+': return $a+$b;
    case '-': return $a-$b;
    case '*': return $a*$b;
    case '/': return $b!=0?$a/$b:'err';
  }
}
echo calc(3,2,'+');
?>
